name: UBUNTOO LLC
goal:
UBUNTOO is a global collaboration platform to scale impactful innovations that address the UN Sustainable Development Goals.

On the UBUNTOO platform we connect key stakeholders in the “sustainability grid”: changemakers at big corporations, governments, NGO’s, purpose driven entrepreneurs, innovators, experts, and influencers.

Imagine a LinkedIn for Sustainability

Our initial focus is on solutions to end plastic packaging waste and pollution. Future areas will include water, climate, agriculture, sustainable energy and other topics covered by the UN SDG’s.
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Policies involving Circular Economy, specifically on environmental topics (e.g. single-use plastics)
